name: World Cup Run
description:
Play this offline game and enjoy the best football match! It’s one of the best offline games in 2019. Be the professional football player in the very exciting soccer game.

Soccer Run is the funny game for any soccer fans. It’s offline game where you can show your kickball skills, running skills and osm skills. If you've ever dream to score a match-winning goal for your football team, this is your chance.

The world cup will begin very soon, football player need to train their soccer skills for getting the best football score!
And you can be the hero of Soccer, you will be contacted by the soccer manager for the strong soccer teams of the mls, premier league, and the dream league, where only the best football players play.

Dropped right in the stadium as the sole striker of your favorite World Cup football team, your mission in soccer games is racing down to the opposing goal, by running pass horde of enemy defenders and, before facing the goalkeeper and score the fanciest goals.

Get into the dream football league and become the best football player ever
Run in your way to get a good position to score a best goal of soccer games
Time your movement correctly to dodge the opponents in style
Don’t get yourself run into obstacles or you’ll lose your streak
Slide your finger to make beautiful shots in soccer games
Complete achievements and compare your progress with friends over the world
Share your best score record on Facebook to get rewards
This Football game is offline game and very simple to play, tough to master
Wonderful soccer games with stunning 3D graphics, cut scenes and animations
You can play this foot ball game anywhere, anytime because it’s offline game

Use your foot for running and scoring excellent goals. Your performances will be talked by all soccer news in the dls. Get the chance of being a real score hero and enjoy the main national championships of the soccer world with one of the most funny football games.

Enjoy the best soccer game 2019 while you run and score incredible goals with your soccer team. If you train hard, you will able to play the best soccer match of the career of any soccer player: the final of the World Cup with your national team - the dream cup!

Challenge the world across different offline games! Hit the targets in a fast-paced, time-limited match.
This football game is offline and free to play, let’s start your amazing football career now!
